vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17;
son of: Beriah (H1283);
brother of: Heber (H2268);
father of: Birzaith (H1269)
Group of mal.ki.el (מַלְכִּיאֵל "Malchiel" H4439)
§ Malchielites = Malchiel "my king is God"
an Asherite and a descendant of Malchiel, the grandson of Asher
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Malquiel; tribu de Aser
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪結族 这个形容詞, 種族名稱在原文的意思是 瑪結 "我王是上帝"
亞設人, 瑪結的後裔, 亞設的孫子(民 26:45)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛结族 这个形容词, 种族名称在原文的意思是 玛结 "我王是上帝"
亚设人, 玛结的后裔, 亚设的孙子(民 26:45)
